page.title: 07Law and Order.
page.content: There is very little crime in this area and in the winter there are only 2 policemen for the whole of the Scilly Isles.In the summer 2 more police constables from the Devon and Cornwall Constabulary are posted here to help with the influx of tourists. There are also 3 special constables for use on certain special occasions. The police station has 2 cells and was built in 1975.There is also a police land rover,a bicycle and a police speedboat for visiting other islands. The responsibility for smuggling and associated cries comes under our local Customs and Immigration Officer.A Magistrates Court is set up on St. Mary's and there are 5 J.P.'s.Any more serious crime has to be tried at Bodmin in Cornwall.
